bottles.message: Everything is going to be okay
Just wanted to let you know that for a few weeks now I have been healing, and I sincerely hope you will get to heal too, or anything else that you may need. Life can be great too.
Hello villager- life is hard but you are brave! We’ll get through this together!
Can you find something to be grateful today? Whether it's upcoming or it already happened, anything nice no matter how small. This evening the spaghetti I made turned out really tasty!
even if all seems dark, dont give up! it does get easier with time

Just here to let you know that there's people out there that love and appreciate you and when you feel like that's not the case, they are yet to appear in your life - so stay strong! Also, go to the gym :P
To everyone who is sick right now, like me, wether it‘s physical or mental, stay strong!! I love you!! Enjoy your time and well deserved rest on your Island! Get better soon <333
Life's gonna keep throwing challenges at you. While it may be harsh, the world was not made for those like us and maybe that'sokay. Always keep fighting for whoyou want to be <3
Don't just sit there and waste your precious time. When you want to do something, do it right away. Do it when you can. It's the only way to live a life without regrets.
Whatever you are going to do:Don't be afraid! You got this!I believe in you! ♥️
I hope you have a nice day!
I am hungry.
Sometimes, I gaze upon the night sky, with you on my mind. I breath the breeze as clouds fly, and wish to leave it all behind. But where do I go if not to you... Do you often think of me too?
You're a treasure, it's true! Amidst the deep dark blue. You're a gem, one of its kind, a beautiful rare find. You are greatness born from pain, an oyster's sweet refrain! Life is your oyster!

Fireworks are one of my favorite things in life. We only see them here on New Year's and they never fail to amaze me. They remind me of being a child filled with wonder and my heart fills with happiness ♥
If you're depressed, having something to look forward to can help! It can be a meal you're going to make, having a get-together with friends, or even watching a movie with popcorn.
I like cheese. Cheese is nice. Mozzarella is good. Feta is good. Cheddar is the BEST. Kirkland cheddar? On TOP. 10/10 BEST cheddar. You should try it.
bottles.signature: Happy cheese tasting, from Your Friend

bottles.message: Hiiiiiiiiiii
You are loved.
Don't give up! :>
I wish you luck because life ain't easy and I absolutely wish you to be kind and have a good heart for that’s how true life is meant to be experienced.

Oh, so we all depressed, huh. What a crazy place to find ourselves.
I don't have any words of wisdom.
Just know we're all here together.
Remember to take life a step at a time and cherish the moments you get. And drink water!!
Life sucks and I doubt my personal decisions every day. But today is sunny and I had nice food and I ran into a friend. Let's hang in there a little longer!
